santa_logistics.gui.robo_elf.title: Activity Stress:
santa_logistics.gui.santa_dock.status.co: Santa will pass by this dock tonight
Generating extreme power through the frostburn engine
Frostburn engine is a very powerful stress generator, with massive amount of SU produced
the more you §aoverclock §rit (through the right-click menu), §athe §amore §aSU §ait §aproduces§r...
If temperature reaches a §ccritical §cpoint§r, or it's §cbroken §cwhen §ctemperature §cis §ctoo §chigh§r...
§6Santa§r, has luckily found a solution for us...
...§bcryolite §ris a very cold and extremely functional liquid to lower your engine's temperature!
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf.text_1: Robo elves can be found in many cold biomes...
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf.text_3: You can use an axe to wax them till they are §aclean§r.
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf.text_4: Every elf has a Charge which will decrease as he does more activities and gets §6stressed§r.
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf.text_5: You can manually charge a robo-elf by holding shift+right-click
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf.text_6: When their charge gets lower, they will automatically try to find a charge station, if possible, and auto-charge
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf_packagin: Robo elves can collect packages dropped on ground...
Presents can only be opened by a player who's name matches the address, and will hide the content
Be careful, crafting too many presents may stress the robo-elf
santa_logistics.ponder.robo_elf_trust.te: Robo elves are very important to gain §6santa's trust§r...
...by interacting with a robo-elf, you can see a menu opens up.
You can exchange materials with a robo elf to unlock several special items, and gain trust...
...every item requested, will be queued, with a max of 18 items.
Once the robo-elf is done crafting, he will personally hold your item in his inventory, and try to find you in order to deliver it!
Don't mess with the robo-elf, as it will lower your trust
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_claus.text_: Santa claus is a very busy hard-worker...
...he has a precise schedule, which can be seen on a §6Schedule §6clock§r.
After sleeping, there is a short period where you can interact with Santa...
...here is where you will use the §6trust§r you gained.
Use a pair of goggles to see what reward you can unlock, them being §cRed§r if your trust is not enough for that reward, and §bAqua§r if you're ready to unlock it
Finally, give santa various food, as some increase satisfaction for reward A, and some increase it for reward B...
...once the satisfaction is reached, santa will personally craft your item and hold it in his hands.
Interact with santa to obtain the item
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.header: Exchanging global packages with the santa dock
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_1: Santa docks allow global package exchanges
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_2: Right click to open the menu, and setup an address...
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_3: ...if everything went correctly, your dock will say it's connected through the goggle tooltip...
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_4: ...and now your address is global and unique.
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_5: During the night, something special will happen...
santa_logistics.ponder.santa_dock.text_7: Otherwise, if you want to send a package, put it in your santa dock...
